data.text: Fuu…… Fuu……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Fuu…… Fuu……

data.text:
Looking good, Bright, looks like you've got a 
handle on the pace needed for 3200m. Don't 
forget that feeling!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Looking good, Bright, looks like you've got a 
<story>handle on the pace needed for 3200m. Don't 
<story>forget that feeling!

data.text:
Yes……! 
Like this, I'll do one more!
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Yes……! 
<story>Like this, I'll do one more!

data.text:
Got it, let's work harder 
for a little bit more!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Got it, let's work harder 
<story>for a little bit more!

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…………。

data.text:
Gathering intel? Looks like they're 
both fired up, aren't they?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Gathering intel? Looks like they're 
<story>both fired up, aren't they?

data.text:
Yes, seeing her like that, it seems she is 
truly a determined Uma Musume. Of course, 
she's strong too.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Yes, seeing her like that, it seems she is 
<story>truly a determined Uma Musume. Of course, 
<story>she's strong too.

data.text:
However, Special Week-san isn't lacking in 
any of that either. She's been consistently 
putting in the effort.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>However, Special Week-san isn't lacking in 
<story>any of that either. She's been consistently 
<story>putting in the effort.

data.text:
……Speaking of, I don't see 
Spe anywhere around here.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>……Speaking of, I don't see 
<story>Spe anywhere around here.

data.text:
Right now, she should be with Trainer-san 
in a meeting about prepartions for 
for the real thing.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Right now, she should be with Trainer-san 
<story>in a meeting about prepartions for 
<story>for the real thing.

data.text: Pacing and tactics…… is it?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Pacing and tactics…… is it?

data.text:
Of course it's important to keep in mind your 
own stamina, but it's also important to think 
about how your opponents are using theirs.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course it's important to keep in mind your 
<story>own stamina, but it's also important to think 
<story>about how your opponents are using theirs.

data.text:
Of course it's important to keep in mind your 
own stamina, but it's also important to think 
about how your opponents are using theirs.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course it's important to keep in mind your 
<story>own stamina, but it's also important to think 
<story>about how your opponents are using theirs.

data.text: I see…… sounds complicated……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I see…… sounds complicated……

data.text:
But this is also so I can win! On 
such a big stage, it's important to 
leave good results, right?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But this is also so I can win! On 
<story>such a big stage, it's important to 
<story>leave good results, right?!

data.text: (Knock knock knock……)
data.processed: <story>(Knock knock knock……)

data.text: Pardon the intrusion.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Pardon the intrusion.

data.text:
McQueen-san? Did you need 
to talk to Trainer-san?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>McQueen-san? Did you need 
<story>to talk to Trainer-san?

data.text:
Rather than Trainer-san, it's more accurate 
to say I'm here to speak with both of you.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Rather than Trainer-san, it's more accurate 
<story>to say I'm here to speak with both of you.

data.text:
You said you were going to be speaking 
about the race, so I thought that I 
could perhaps lend a hand.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>You said you were going to be speaking 
<story>about the race, so I thought that I 
<story>could perhaps lend a hand.

data.text:
McQueen's won consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] 
after all. By all means, please join us.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>McQueen's won consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] 
<story>after all. By all means, please join us.

data.text:
McQueen's won consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] 
after all. By all means, please join us.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>McQueen's won consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] 
<story>after all. By all means, please join us.

data.text: Yes, I'd be glad to.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, I'd be glad to.

data.text: Waaa! Thank you very much-!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Waaa! Thank you very much-!

data.text: Knock knock knock!! I'm coming in!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Knock knock knock!! I'm coming in!

data.text:
I was wondering if I could help out with 
Spe-chan's strategy meeting — ……oh, wait? 
McQueen's here too.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>I was wondering if I could help out with 
<story>Spe-chan's strategy meeting — ……oh, wait? 
<story>McQueen's here too.

data.text: Excuse me…… fue? McQueen-san and Ticket-san?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Excuse me…… fue? McQueen-san and Ticket-san?

data.text:
……well, I guess I didn't need 
to come here after all……
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>……well, I guess I didn't need 
<story>to come here after all……

data.text:
Wawaa……?! It's getting crowded 
in here all of a sudden……!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Wawaa……?! It's getting crowded 
<story>in here all of a sudden……!?

data.text:
Hafuu～…… Race progression, taking position…… 
it feels like I've just done a lifetime's 
worth of studying.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hafuu～…… Race progression, taking position…… 
<story>it feels like I've just done a lifetime's 
<story>worth of studying.

data.text:
But, since I've gotten a lot of 
advice from everyone, it feels like 
I definitely won't lose!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But, since I've gotten a lot of 
<story>advice from everyone, it feels like 
<story>I definitely won't lose!

data.text: Yeah, do your best……!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Yeah, do your best……!

data.text:
We'll be cheering you on, so 
go out there and win～!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>We'll be cheering you on, so 
<story>go out there and win～!

data.text:
Before I realized it, every member of the 
team had gathered to help Special Week.
data.processed:
<story>Before I realized it, every member of the 
<story>team had gathered to help Special Week.

data.text:
Supporting Uma Musume, so they can take hold 
of their dreams― It was promising that 
everyone felt that way, and I was overjoyed
data.processed:
<story>Supporting Uma Musume, so they can take hold 
<story>of their dreams― It was promising that 
<story>everyone felt that way, and I was overjoyed

data.text:
Ah, that's right, Trainer-san! I grabbed this 
on the way to the trainer's room!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Ah, that's right, Trainer-san! I grabbed this 
<story>on the way to the trainer's room!

data.text: Here, the questionnaire for the article.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Here, the questionnaire for the article.

data.text:
Didn't Tazuna-san contact 
you about this before?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Didn't Tazuna-san contact 
<story>you about this before?

data.text: Now that you mention it……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Now that you mention it……

data.text:
As if to avert my gaze from their looks of 
shock, I looked down at the questionnaire. 
One question caught my attention.
data.processed:
<story>As if to avert my gaze from their looks of 
<story>shock, I looked down at the questionnaire. 
<story>One question caught my attention.

data.text:
[To you, which race do you feel the most 
emotional attachment to?] ―
data.processed:
<story>[To you, which race do you feel the most 
<story>emotional attachment to?] ―

data.text:
The answer column had [Japan Derby] written 
quite a few times, which was a very Winning 
Ticket-like answer, but in the corner……
data.processed:
<story>The answer column had [Japan Derby] written 
<story>quite a few times, which was a very Winning 
<story>Ticket-like answer, but in the corner……

data.text: [Spring Tenno Sho]……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>[Spring Tenno Sho]……?

data.text:
To think you'd put down anything other than 
the Derby, that's pretty unusual, huh? You 
didn't eat something funny did you?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>To think you'd put down anything other than 
<story>the Derby, that's pretty unusual, huh? You 
<story>didn't eat something funny did you?

data.text: Ahaha, I didn't eat anything like that.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Ahaha, I didn't eat anything like that.

data.text:
While it'll never take first place over the 
Derby, this is a questionnaire focusing on 
＜Sirius＞ right?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>While it'll never take first place over the 
<story>Derby, this is a questionnaire focusing on 
<story>＜Sirius＞ right?

data.text:
While thinking a whole lot about the team, 
Ding! Just like that I remembered something!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>While thinking a whole lot about the team, 
<story>Ding! Just like that I remembered something!

data.text:
The first time I clearly remember hearing 
about ＜Sirius＞ was right around when McQueen 
first won the [Spring Tenno Sho]!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>The first time I clearly remember hearing 
<story>about ＜Sirius＞ was right around when McQueen 
<story>first won the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

data.text: My race……?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>My race……?

data.text:
Around that time, since I didn't really know 
much about the team, I remembered just 
thinking that was a great race, but……
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Around that time, since I didn't really know 
<story>much about the team, I remembered just 
<story>thinking that was a great race, but……

data.text:
Hearing that it was McQueen's dearest wish, 
and that the team's existence was on the line 
with that race……
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Hearing that it was McQueen's dearest wish, 
<story>and that the team's existence was on the line 
<story>with that race……

data.text:
Uwooooo～nn! I was glad I got to 
see that [Spring Tenno Sho]～!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uwooooo～nn! I was glad I got to 
<story>see that [Spring Tenno Sho]～!!

data.text:
Me too, after seeing that race I was so 
moved, I joined the team!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Me too, after seeing that race I was so 
<story>moved, I joined the team!

data.text:
Who would have thought that McQueen-san was 
the only member of the team, but since then 
the team has grown～
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Who would have thought that McQueen-san was 
<story>the only member of the team, but since then 
<story>the team has grown～

data.text:
……for Rice too, the [Spring Tenno 
Sho] is an important race.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>……for Rice too, the [Spring Tenno 
<story>Sho] is an important race.

data.text:
The first time I held the resolve to 
win, and the first time I learned the 
joy of winning, was this race.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>The first time I held the resolve to 
<story>win, and the first time I learned the 
<story>joy of winning, was this race.

data.text:
……For me, the [Spring Tenno Sho] 
could be called my target.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>……For me, the [Spring Tenno Sho] 
<story>could be called my target.

data.text:
Injury prevented my first attempt, and my 
next attempt I was one step short…… 
seriously, just how strong is my ambition?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Injury prevented my first attempt, and my 
<story>next attempt I was one step short…… 
<story>seriously, just how strong is my ambition?

data.text:
Everyone had such varied reasons but it 
seemed like the [Spring Tenno Sho] had a deep 
connection with all of them.
data.processed:
<story>Everyone had such varied reasons but it 
<story>seemed like the [Spring Tenno Sho] had a deep 
<story>connection with all of them.

data.text: ―And it was the same for me.
data.processed: <story>―And it was the same for me.

data.text:
It was McQueen's goal, but it was 
also my very first G1 victory.
data.processed:
<story>It was McQueen's goal, but it was 
<story>also my very first G1 victory.

data.text:
As ＜Sirius＞'s successor, it was the first 
time I was able to help an Uma Musume I was 
responsible for take hold of their dream.
data.processed:
<story>As ＜Sirius＞'s successor, it was the first 
<story>time I was able to help an Uma Musume I was 
<story>responsible for take hold of their dream.

data.text:
For me too, it's a race filled with a 
lifetime's worth of memories.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>For me too, it's a race filled with a 
<story>lifetime's worth of memories.

data.text:
For me too, it's a race filled with a 
lifetime's worth of memories.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>For me too, it's a race filled with a 
<story>lifetime's worth of memories.

data.text:
For everyone, is was a really irreplaceable 
race wasn't iiiiit～! Oh～nononn!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>For everyone, is was a really irreplaceable 
<story>race wasn't iiiiit～! Oh～nononn!!

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
……Um, Trainer-san. If I were to win the 
[Spring Tenno Sho], would you be happy?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……Um, Trainer-san. If I were to win the 
<story>[Spring Tenno Sho], would you be happy?

data.text:
Of course I would. You've been working 
towards it as your spring goal, 
so I want Spe to win―
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course I would. You've been working 
<story>towards it as your spring goal, 
<story>so I want Spe to win―

data.text:
Aah, no! I'm not asking about 
it in regards to my goal……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Aah, no! I'm not asking about 
<story>it in regards to my goal……

data.text:
This race, to Trainer-san and everyone, it's 
a very special thing, right?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>This race, to Trainer-san and everyone, it's 
<story>a very special thing, right?

data.text:
That's why, I want this race to 
become special to me too!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why, I want this race to 
<story>become special to me too!

data.text:
＜Sirius＞ is… well it's something that's like 
my second home now I'd say……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>＜Sirius＞ is… well it's something that's like 
<story>my second home now I'd say……

data.text:
Where we all support each other, just like a 
family, it's a wonderful team.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Where we all support each other, just like a 
<story>family, it's a wonderful team.

data.text:
That's why, just like everyone here, 
as a member of the team, I want to 
win the [Spring Tenno Sho]!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why, just like everyone here, 
<story>as a member of the team, I want to 
<story>win the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

data.text: As a member of the team…… is it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>As a member of the team…… is it?

data.text:
Fufuu, in that case I have a favor to ask. By 
all means, obtain that Spring trophy that was 
the starting point for this team.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, in that case I have a favor to ask. By 
<story>all means, obtain that Spring trophy that was 
<story>the starting point for this team.

data.text:
Yeah, Rice wants to see the 
Tenno Sho trophy too.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, Rice wants to see the 
<story>Tenno Sho trophy too.

data.text: Me too, me too! So, Spe-chan please!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Me too, me too! So, Spe-chan please!

data.text: ……Can you do it, Spe?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>……Can you do it, Spe?

data.text: Yeah, leave it to me!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, leave it to me!

data.text:
Trainer-san too, how about entrusting your 
feelings to Special Week-san too?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san too, how about entrusting your 
<story>feelings to Special Week-san too?

data.text:
Trainer-san, the [Spring Tenno 
Sho], I'll win it for sure!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, the [Spring Tenno 
<story>Sho], I'll win it for sure!

data.text:
This girl who came from Hokkaido not knowing 
right from left, more so than when we first 
met, her gaze was diginified and strong.
data.processed:
<story>This girl who came from Hokkaido not knowing 
<story>right from left, more so than when we first 
<story>met, her gaze was diginified and strong.

data.text:
She's steadily getting closer and closer to 
being "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― when looking 
at her, I couldn't help but think that.
data.processed:
<story>She's steadily getting closer and closer to 
<story>being "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― when looking 
<story>at her, I couldn't help but think that.

data.text: Ehehee, Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehee, Yeah!
